name: Kitty Perry l G15 l Slow
bio: Shalom! I'm Kitty Perry l G15 l Slow. I'm a Culinary Sanitation Specialist by day, and I like siring for status by night. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their oversized sweaters and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. We're so fur-tunate to have found each other!
